contentfulProduct.seoTitle: Luxe Italian Cotton Hotel Duvet Cover Set
contentfulProduct.seoDescription: Our line of Italian bedding is masterfully crafted of the finest long-staple cotton by renowned Italian artisans in the outskirts of Florence. Our sophisticated and classic duvet set mimics the smooth percale fabric and refined style found in 5-star hotel
contentfulProduct.title: Luxe Italian Cotton Hotel Duvet Cover Set

content.value: Our line of Italian bedding is masterfully crafted of the finest long-staple cotton by renowned Italian artisans in the outskirts of Florence. Our sophisticated and classic duvet set mimics the smooth percale fabric and refined style found in 5-star hotels across the globe. Set includes duvet cover and two shams.
Percale weave made of the finest 100% long-staple cotton
Features a satin stitch embroidery detail
Set includes duvet cover and two shams
Full/Queen set includes standard size shams, King/Cal King set includes king size shams
Shams feature envelope closure
Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
Masterfully crafted in Italy
Wash with care

productDetails.productDetails:
• Percale weave made of the finest 100% long-staple cotton
  • Features a satin stitch embroidery detail
  • Set includes duvet cover and two shams
  • Full/Queen set includes standard size shams, King/Cal King set includes king size shams
  • Shams feature envelope closure
  • Free of harmful chemicals and toxins
  • Masterfully crafted in Italy

productDescription.productDescription: Our line of Italian bedding is masterfully crafted of the finest long-staple cotton by renowned Italian artisans in the outskirts of Florence. Our sophisticated and classic duvet set mimics the smooth percale fabric and refined style found in 5-star hotels across the globe. Set includes duvet cover and two shams.
